title.rendered: Can I skip leg day if I…?

content.rendered:
…injured something in my lower body?

Yes.

…have an explicit restriction from my doctor?

Yes.

…don’t have legs?

Yes.

…<any other reason>?

No.

But I cycle / run / play soccer?

No.

Ultimately, you are an adult – You can do whatever you want, and you don’t need r/Fitness‘s permission. But skipping strength training for the largest group of muscles in your body is not a good idea, and endurance based exercises are not an adequate substitute for resistance training.
